title: Parrot
tagline: Build Your Community, Not Your Backlog
subtagline: The AI-powered inbox that helps creators, founders, and sales teams nurture thousands of relationships across every platform.

valueProps.title: Never Miss a Fan
valueProps.description: Every DM matters. Parrot ensures no message falls through the cracks - whether it's a potential customer, a superfan, or your next collaborator.

valueProps.title: Scale Your Personal Touch
valueProps.description: AI that learned YOUR voice replies to your community authentically. They'll never know it wasn't you (unless you tell them).

valueProps.title: Relationships, Not Just Messages
valueProps.description: Built-in CRM tracks every interaction. Know who's engaged, who's slipping away, and who deserves your personal attention.

audienceSections.title: For Creators & Influencers
points: Manage DMs across Instagram, Twitter/X, Telegram, Discord - all in one view
Auto-respond to common questions while you create
Identify your most engaged fans with interaction stats
Keep your authentic voice in every reply

audienceSections.title: For Founders & Entrepreneurs
points: Turn DMs into deals with built-in lead tracking
Never ghost a potential customer again
CRM that works where your conversations happen

audienceSections.title: For Community Managers & Sales
points: Kanban workflow: Unread → In Progress → Done
Batch reply to dozens of messages in minutes
Tag and categorize contacts by relationship type
Track response times and engagement patterns

featureSections.headline: Your voice. At scale.
featureSections.description: Parrot learns how you write from just 5 sample messages. Your emoji habits, your greeting style, your tone. When it replies, your community can't tell the difference - because it sounds exactly like you.

featureSections.headline: Agents that never sleep.
featureSections.description: Set up autopilot agents to handle the repetitive stuff. They answer FAQs, qualify inbound leads, schedule calls, and keep conversations warm - all in your voice, all while you sleep.

featureSections.headline: Every platform. One inbox.
featureSections.description: WhatsApp, Instagram, LinkedIn, Twitter/X, Telegram, Discord - all your conversations in one unified view. Stop context-switching. Start building relationships.
